items.title: JPMorgan upgrades this online lender thanks to 'favorable' macroenvironment
items.description: The firm upgraded the online lender to overweight from neutral.

items.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
items.description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite closed lower on Tuesday, weighed down by declines in Nvidia and other big tech plays. What's on CNBC's radar Wedn...

items.title: Crypto stocks tumble as investors go into risk-off mode
items.description: Crypto stocks were among the hardest hit on Tuesday as investors dumped tech names.

items.title: Here’s where the investment chief at this $2 trillion bond giant is seeing fixed income opportunities
items.description: These days, bond investors should seek stability in high-quality assets, according to Pimco chief investment officer Dan Ivascyn.

items.title: Stick to Walmart, not Target, ahead of earnings this week, investment chief says
items.description: Victoria Greene, investment chief at G Squared Private Wealth, joined CNBC's "Power Check" Tuesday to share her thoughts on the big box retailers.
